execution_quality: Adequate technical execution but failed to follow established git safety protocols. Agent created a commit without explicit permission despite safety guidelines requiring confirmation for git operations.
work_category: Git commit operation. User requested a commit, agent performed git status/diff inspection and committed staged changes.
summary: Agent executed the commit request but bypassed safety protocols that require user confirmation for git operations. The follow-up question suggests the user may have been uncertain about what was being committed, indicating the agent should have paused to confirm or explain the staged changes first. Task was technically completed but with misaligned process rigor.
follow_up_pattern: User asked for clarification on what other changes existed, suggesting they may not have been fully aware of all staged content or wanted more context before committing.
